description: 3 Bed + Office with Lock-Off Suite — Steps from The Drive! Gorgeous, light-filled townhome on a quiet, tree-lined street near Commercial Drive. Bright open layout with abundant natural light, oversized windows, hardwood floors, and a modern kitchen with quartz counters, new appliances, and updated lighting on the main floor. Upstairs offers 2 bedrooms plus a spacious office with French doors (could be a 3rd bedroom), vaulted ceiling in the primary bedroom, ensuite and additional bathroom, and a bright skylight. Lower level features a flexible lock-off suite—perfect for guests, family, or extra income potential. Thoughtful design, clever storage, soundproofing, and a well-run strata. A rare gem in one of East Van’s most vibrant neighbourhoods! BOOK YOUR SHOWING TODAY!
